text: Yosef tee sɛ Arkelao2.22 Ɔhempɔn Herode ba yi dii ade sɛ ɔhene wɔ Yudea ne Samaria mfirihyia du pɛ. (4 AYA–6 YAA) Na ɔyɛ otirimɔdenfo ne nhyɛsotraso. Eyi ma wotuu no ade so maa Yudea bɛyɛɛ Roma mantam a na wotua tow ma Roma Ɔhempɔn no ananmusini. a ɔyɛ Herode ba na odi hene wɔ Yudea saa bere no mu no, osuroo sɛ ɔbɛkɔ hɔ. Awurade san soo no dae foforo bio sɛ ɔnnkɔ Yudea, na mmom, ɔnkɔ Galilea.2.22 Yesu bere so no, na Galilea da Ɔman Kronkron no atifi fam.
